unnormalised: PENN khardi (zoxem ABCDE1234F) tumchea Aadhaar khardi kodden 31/03/2024 porian zoddunk xikxa vochuncheak, ani tumchem GSTIN (zoxem 06AAACC1234A1ZJ) nirantor vepar choloucheak update korunk visrum naka.
normalised: tumchea P-A-N cardak (zoxem A-B-C-D-E ek don tin char F) tumchea Aadhaar cardak tis ekve march don hazar chovis meren jodunk yaad dovrat zaapdaad vochonk xinkaunk, ani tumcho G-S-T-I-N (zoxem zero so A-A-A-C-C ek don tin char A ek Z-J) nirantar vepar cholovnne khatir update asa mhunn nischit korun gheiat.
text: PENN khardi (zoxem ABCDE1234F) tumchea Aadhaar khardi kodden 31/03/2024 porian zoddunk xikxa vochuncheak, ani tumchem GSTIN (zoxem 06AAACC1234A1ZJ) nirantor vepar choloucheak update korunk visrum naka.
